messages.title: Putting local people first
messages.content: Labour is rebuilding our country. My job is to get our area its fair share of resources. I'm pleased we have an extra 90 teachers and 210 teaching assistants in Amber Valley schools to help our children reach their full potential.

messages.title: Working Hard For Amber Valley
messages.content: As your MP I have been hands on in the constituency, working closely with Labour councillors and local organisations.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Guaranteed education or training place for young people up to 18
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A job or trainee place for 18-24 year olds out of work for six months funded by a tax on bankers bonuses.
Halving the deficit in four years by protecting front-line services and curbing less essential spending.

issues.economy: Halving the deficit in four years by protecting front-line services and curbing less essential spending.
issues.education: An extra 90 teachers and 210 teaching assistants in Amber Valley schools to help our children reach their full potential.
issues.governance: Working closely with Labour councillors and local organisations.
issues.health: Cancers diagnosed within one week through action on GPs surgeries.

contactInformation.address: Prospect Lodge, Nottingham Road, Ripley, DE5 3AZ

endorsements.endorser: Gavin Chamberlain, Chair of Codnor Castle Preservation Society
endorsements.endorsement: Judy Mallaber as our referee for the funding bid from Awards for All and it was partly due to the fantastic letter of support that Judy submitted that we were awarded the much needed funding that our Society needs to carry out our work.

quotes.text: Judy always gets involved and shows support for all local people
quotes.source: Nicola Bettison - Alfreton Library Big Read.

quotes.text: I had my cataract removed and can see better than I have for 10 years. I don't need glasses any more and my eyes didn't need hardly any more. It's wonderful! - no glasses!

images.caption: Judy Mallaber with various community members and groups.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet mentions support from local organisations and the commitment to community as evidenced by positive testimonials from local community members.
